summary: This document consists of administrative records from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, primarily from August 9-10, 2019. It includes an official inmate out-count sheet, an inmate roster with suicide watch assignments, and official count slips. The records show inmate counts and assignments, including several inmates placed on suicide watch.

events.title: Inmate Suicide Watch Assignments
events.description: Four inmates (BULLOCK, DECAPUA, GAMA-PINEDA, MCDUFFIE) are recorded on the inmate roster as being on 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Official Prison Out-Count
events.description: An official out-count was conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, at 00:35:17, showing a total inmate population of 758 with 4 out-counted, resulting in a verified count of 754.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are prison administrative records from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated August 9-10, 2019.
An official out-count on August 10, 2019, at 00:35:17 recorded a total inmate population of 758, with 4 out-counted, verifying a count of 754.
An inmate roster from August 9, 2019, lists four inmates (BULLOCK, DECAPUA, GAMA-PINEDA, MCDUFFIE) assigned to 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' status.
The documents include multiple official count slips and administrative forms used for inmate tracking and population management.
